item.description: To celebrate the opening of Downtown Yoga's sister studio Cycled Energy we invite you to our open house Thursday March 15th from 4-8pm. We appreciate all of the support we have received from our students and community, and to thank you we are holding four special classes for free: 430-530pm Yoga Fusion with Cyndi Roberts 530-630pm Cycling with Matt Fenichel 6-715pm Vinyasa Flow with Amy Merli 7-8pm Cycling with Jodi Palerma If you can't make it to a full class, stop by anyway and enjoy light refreshments, collect info about our new cycling studio, or to receive 10% off class pass purchases and apparel! Imani Mamulation will be in the stuido on this special day with samples from Alchemy Juice Bar. Alchemy, with the support of Downtown Yoga will be running a three day juice cleanse Apri 18-20th. Receive $25 off our juice cleanse when you sign up during our open house.
item.name: Downtown Yoga's Open House
